entry.title: Monday: Mainly sunny. High minus 10.
entry.summary: Mainly sunny. Wind becoming east 20 km/h gusting to 40 near noon. High minus 10. Wind chill minus 30 this morning and minus 18 this afternoon. Risk of frostbite. UV index 3 or moderate. Forecast issued 05:00 AM CST Monday 06 March 2023

entry.title: Monday night: Increasing cloudiness. Low minus 19.
